description.value:
[Addictive] Space Cocaine. User gains +20 Willpower for 1d10 minutes per dose. If used more than twice a week user must make -20 Willpower Test or become addicted. Addicted users often take drug daily, leading to eye discolouration.

Requirements

Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -20 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
